skillRows.name: Viva La Girls!
skillRows.description:
ELF has two forms of Basic ATK:
Basic ATK 1: Attack continuously dealing 2100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Basic ATK 2: Thrust foward to deal 2100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Restore 0.85 SP every second in battle.
ATK Interval: 3.3s

skillRows.name: I Can Talk about This All Day
skillRows.description: ELF's Basic ATK restores 5.0 bonus SP. CD: 2.0s.

skillRows.name: Never Tired
skillRows.description: ELF's attacks have a 40.0% chance to deal 60.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. CD: 6s.

skillRows.name: Double Seriousness
skillRows.description: ELF's Basic ATK boosts its Total DMG by 30.0% on hit for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

skillRows.name: Immortal Blades!!
skillRows.description:
Blink to the target location, pull in enemies, and unleash AoE attacks dealing 600% x 8 ATK of Physical DMG. Afterwards, pull in enemies again and deal 1800% ATK of Physical DMG. Enemies hit are inflicted with Dissociated stacks (lasting 5s) and each stack makes them take 1.0% bonus Physical DMG. 5 stacks max. Ultimate also reduces switch CD.

CD: 45s
SP: 75

skillRows.name: Cheat Loop
skillRows.description: Ultimate boosts ELF's Crit Rate by 90.0% for 20.0s.

skillRows.name: Maxwell's Demon
skillRows.description: ELF's Ultimate deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG.

skillRows.name: Holy Blade of Existentialism
skillRows.description: Switching Valkyrie boosts team Total DMG by 2.0 for 8.0s. 2 stacks max.

skillRows.name: Form of Existence
skillRows.description: [Lineup] When team leader is a Physical DMG dealer, team deals 5.0% bonus Physical DMG.

skillRows.name: Existence of Form
skillRows.description: [Lineup] Each stack of Dissociated boosts Physical DMG taken by affected enemies by 2.00% when there's at least one Physical DMG dealer on the team.
